name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DF Tube New (Distraction Free for YouTube™)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow yourself to focus while using YouTube™ for work, recreation or education.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📺💡 Stay Focused with DF Tube! 🚫

Tired of mindless scrolling on YouTube? 🙅‍♂️ Want to break the cycle of endless video recommendations and stay focused on what matters? 🤔

Introducing DF Tube, the ultimate productivity companion for YouTube! 📊 By default, DF Tube disables autoplay, hides distracting video recommendations, and removes the grid of suggested videos on your homepage. 🙅‍♂️ It's like having a personal assistant to help you stay on track! 🤝

With DF Tube, you can:

✨ Disable autoplay and take control of your video watching experience ✨ Hide video recommendations and related videos to avoid distractions ✨ Remove the grid of recommended videos on your homepage ✨ Hide comments and disable playlists sitewide (optional)

Take back control of your YouTube experience and focus on the content that matters to you! 📚💻 Whether you're a student, researcher, or simply looking for some relaxing music, DF Tube is here to help you stay focused and productive. 🎯

Try DF Tube today and discover a more mindful way to use YouTube! 🙏

How to use it?
Pin the extension icon in the toolbar, click on the icon to open the settings
